page.title: 09THE GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: I like to play a game called French Elastic. It is a good game. You get a fairly long piece of elastic, you need 3 or more people to play it. Two people put their ankles in the elastic. The other people have to get inside the elastic and then put one foot out and then both feet out. Then you put the other foot in and then put both feet out. The aim is to get the elastic as high up your body as possible. If you touch the elastic with your leg you are out. It is exciting because you don't know if you are going to be out or not. We play it at school at playtime.
